content.detailedDescription: We were clearing snow off of our cars after a recent storm at approximately 8:15pm on 1-14-08. we looked up and over the western sky and saw a series of rather bright lights flashing and illuminating the upper portion of the sky (at cloud level and up). they really looked like an aurora, except the lights changed rather quickly (every second) fading between a reddish hue, a white hue, and a somewhat blue hue. we thought it might be some electrical weather phenomena in the sky. we also thought perhaps it was a medical helicopter or something; however, both the vicinity of where the lights were and the unusual patterns they were making (slow dimming and reappearing) made us question this a bit. also we heard no noise in the vicinity of the lights. we could not see an object due to cloud cover but the lights would fade in and out between levels of very dim to a high luminosity and tended to be in red and white mostly, and occasionally blue. they flashed first for about a minute and then disappeared completely (about 4 minutes). then, they reappeared (but quite a bit further away) and flashed for about another minute. at the second flashing they looked to be higher in altitude than the first flashing. after that they just totally vanished. we also looked to see if anything from the ground may be projecting them, but could not make any visual connections. we looked on in curiosity for a while. the objects didn't fade from view, they just completed stopped glowing with no sign of them after that. we checked the news reports but no accidents were reported. hanscom airport base is vaguely in the direction the lights were, although it is quite a way off. we were interested in possible natural phenomenas that might also cause these night lights at such an unusual latitude/longitude (ma)?
content.summary: Unusual lights in sky over stow/sudbury line seen from hudson ma

content.detailedDescription: I don't live in nyc so i'm not sure specifically where i was but i could ask my father the basic area (cant get ahold of him right now). we were driving along the hudson (the river that seperates ny and nj) and i saw a metalic shiny saucer. what struck me about it was that it was flying below some of the buildings. i thought maybe it was a helicoptor but just after i saw one and it wasn't nearly as shiny and it was moving faster and was twice as high. i saw the ufo go behind one building and out the other side and after 10 seconds it was gone. we had passed some trees and it had gone away because i was keeping track of its flight pattern.
content.summary: Seen across the hudson from nyc. the ufo was in new jersey.

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday january 8th at around 6:45 pm i went outside to plug in the outdoor lights. as i bent down to pick up the cord to my left (east south east) i saw a flickering orange/amber colored light fading out. as it faded out, from my veiwing point about 2 inches directly to the north of it( dont know how that converts in the sky) a second light faded in at the same rate of the other fading out. it repeated this 3 more times, each light was equaly spaced from the light befor it creating a diagonal line. i live in a fairly rural area so it is very unlikly to be a comercial plane because the only time we see planes arounf here is if they are 30000 ft up of crop dusting. i am used to seeing lots of shooting stars out here, but this was very very different then anything i had ever seen.
content.summary: 5 amber lights in diagonal formation as one faded in the one behind faded out

content.detailedDescription: I was about 15 or so when i was outside playing basketball by myself.  it was right before dusk.  i had this odd feeling like i was being watched.  it was strong it wouldn't go away.  so i kept looking around.  then i saw these human shaped things in silver suits.  but i knew right away they weren't human because they could be there one second and then on the other corner of the house the next.  humans can't move like that.  it was like they transferred themselves.  i was scared, but it was weird, i was not scared of them.  normally i would be a chicken, because i am a scaredy cat.  but i wasn't scared of them.  i was scared of what or who they were, not knowing.  its hard to explain.  i went in the house and was a little freaked out at the unknown so i deadbolted the front door and locked it.  it was still pretty light outside.  then i went upstairs and my family (mom dad brothers and sisters) were watching t.V.  i said nothing, because i felt stupid and like nobody would believe me, but i did go to the patio door also and locked it and put the dead bolt on it.  then i went to take a shower.  as i was in the shower there came this loud noise and the house started to shake.  i got really scared and hurried out of the shower and got dressed and ran into the living room.  my dad was the only one still there.  i said where is everyone and he said they were outside watching a ufo that had just come out of our pasture and went into the sky.  i went running outside and by then all i saw was the speck.  they said that was what made the noise and that it came out of the woods and shot to the sky.  i told my mom what happened to me, and the reason she believed me is because when they went to run outside, the door was deadbolted.  she knew i was telling the truth.  the wierd thing is, we never talked about it, ever, its like it was forgotten.  two weeks later it came back when my mom and dad were home alone.  the same noise, the house started to shake (we were on a cliff with the creek below) and all the electricity went out and a light was shown down on our big back porch which overlooked the creek.  they thought it had to be the same thing.  anyways we never talked about it again.  until about 20 years later.  my mon actually said something to someone and i was like, my god mom you remember that.  why did we neveer talk about it, that was odd.  its hard to explain.
content.summary: Seen beings first, went inside, house shook, family seen ufo come out of our pasture

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear summer evening. my boyfriend and i were laying on our backs on a blanket in the backyard just talking and looking up at the stars when something in the sky caught our vision coming from the south heading north. we both seen it at the same time. he sat up not taking his eye's off this object. i kept my sight on it but turned around onto my knees. we both were silent. the night was silent. this "thing" was shaped like a stealth which would be shaped like a triangle i suppose, and it was (here's the tricky part) invisible. the only way i can discribe it is by saying if you had ever seen the movie the fantastic four and the girl in the movie how she can turn invisible but you can still see her because the outline of her is wavy well that's what this was. you could see the stars straight through it but you knew there was something there because of the distortion around it that made up the shape. well as i said it came in from the south and was heading north when all of a sudden it banked to the west and it was gone. when we could no longer see it i hurried into the house and started crying because it had scared me so bad. i was afraid to go back outside. we both were shocked on what we seen and both startled on what it was. i now am always looking up at the sky in hopes that i will see this again because it has drove me crazy not knowing what it was. i wish i could tell you how high it was only to say that it wasn't as high as a plane would fly but not as low as just over the tree tops. i haven't told to many people about this for fear they would not understand, and i just heard about this site is why i am now just writing about it. i do hope you can maybe tell me what this may have been. 
thank you.
content.summary: More of a shape of a stealth bomber, but see through.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened in february 1974 in chuburna puerta, a tiny fishing village on the gulf of mexico in the yucatan. i and my partner had been in mexico for about three months, and we had been in the yucatan since christmas 1973. travelling with us were a friend of mine from high school and a fellow we���d met on the train from montreal to vancouver. we���d asked him if he wanted to come with us to mexico, because we were going to buy a beater in san francisco and drive across mexico, and we needed someone who could fix a car ��� often.
	we had rented a place in chelem (between progreso and chuburna puerta) for one month, and then we met a young canadian couple whose (names i remember as jerry and cathy) told us that nearby chuburna was a much cleaner, pleasanter place, and there were places to rent with bathrooms and cement ceilings (a plus if you don���t want scorpions dropping randomly from above onto you as you���re lying in your hamaca).
	around this time, we were watching for comet kahoutek (which i did see, faintly, once). jerry and cathy told us about a strange light they had seen recently several times at night looking toward the horizon across the gulf. it was a small, white, roundish-oval-shaped light that moved straight along the distant horizon and then vanished.
	one night around 3 am or so, we all went down to the beach (just a few steps away) and stood on the outside veranda of a concrete villa, someone���s empty summer home. after a while cathy pointed out to the gulf, towards the right end of the horizon, just above the ocean. there was the light they had seen before, and it was moving, not at a breakneck speed but steadily left across our field of vision. when it reached a point where it was in a straight line ahead of us, it made a 90-degree turn and became steadily larger ��� it was a making a beeline toward us.
	within less than five minutes, this light was hovering above the beach slightly to our right, about 30 feet away, maybe 20 to 30 feet up from the ground. we were looking up at it perhaps at a 45-degree angle. it was very silent, but we could detect a faint, low steady hum quite unlike the sound of an airplane or helicopter. there were no discernible features to be seen, just a giant glowing-whitish egg shape hovering there. we felt sure something in there must have been checking us out ��� why else would they have come over here? we were absolutely aghast, blown away and disbelieving all at once. some one said ���should we try communicating with them?��� nobody did (out loud, anyway). i remember feeling very nervous and incredibly curious for maybe four or five minutes as we continued to stare in trepidation  at this ���. object. then it hovered slowly up and wafted over the palm trees of chuburna, away from the ocean. the sky was just starting to lighten, and the object vanished from sight.
	i had never seen anything like this before and have never seen anything like it since. but i have never forgotten it, even though 33 years have passed.
content.summary: Five people witnessed a silent, large glowing egg-shaped object come directly to us and hovered nearby

content.detailedDescription:
I wish i heard simalar stories to know if im not going crazy. it started 6-12-07 in the summer i get drunk at the courtyard at the marriot, i said a prayer out loud requesting to see ufos. one week later on this date im brainwashed i turned the area into a nightly hotspot

the military picked up on this and ive seen strange airplanes with big satellites spinning circles around the area on a nightly basis , although lately its been quiet since new years, i think my prayer made the us government just waste probably over a million dollars in jet fuel in the last 6 months.

ive never seen anything like these floating orbs, its almost like starring at a ghosts orb, it has no rules of latitude or langitude 

ive starred at these things for hours and i think that was it, i know were related to ras family, we domument these things, i think it comes from theyre heart, they love ra sungods family. i heard theyre voices in my head im not stupid.

anyways the point was proven it is over, while i suffer in chicago areain poverty treating 10 dollars like it is a lot of money, the government blows over 1 million dollars in jetfuel chasing after the same lights every night, it obviously wasnt getting anywhere with these mufon morons, but i think they were trying to take pictures although i saw the us planes get only so close to them before they turned off theyre lights and scrammed.

that was the funniest thing, i knew that was a ufo and one of my friends of ra that night and this big old sattelite plane sped dreictly twrds it. i smiled as the funny light over my house everynight flipped its switches and put up theyre middle finger as the us government
while people suffer in poverty they blow millions in jetfuel under skeptism, research of what they do not own, and untrust in our god jesus christ. as if we are not under good hands for a reason"? in a way were not, but, it is because of thieves like these government researchers.

i still dont understand why they brought the us research department to st charles illinois, they made a big out of themsevles, i watched the ufos and planes over my house everynight in poverty. i prayed with my hand together asking for this, but i didnt expect them to make a point to me that theyre acting like were not in good hands.

maybe were not in good hands because of people like those government planes, who just blew over a million dollars and attatining obviously nothing but images of a light that was too bright to get a good pictures, and yet turned off its lights and leaves every time they got too close to it.
 after the first week of this happening every night here, they should of learned theyre lesson perhaps in arizona, knowing that getting too close to those things only makes them flick theyre middle finger switching off the lights. im sure arizona is billions of dollars wasted under them trying to attain a ufo , while they abuse power under representation on the government military and democracy

i dont think so buddy, this is ra sungods family...The fact of dollars they have wasted on chasing a broken record while theyre own world /country suffers in poverty answears the us govrn questions as no, you cannot have a ufo , you just abused youre power under control of democracy under wasting money and abusing powers act f the government amen. 

in the name of the father and of the son and of the holy spirit, amen.
content.shape: Circle,  Disc,  Fireball,  Star-like,  Triangle,  Unknown
content.summary: St charles is a hotspot lately

content.detailedDescription:
The paper says you will be coming down to investigate this latest sighting and although i would love to be there saturday i cannot since my cocker will have her eye removed tuesday due to glaucoma. with other dogs in the house i cannot leave her home alone until the stitches come out.

in-between 1995-1996 while living 13 miles from stephenville down 281 (which has selden on the way), i witnessed something similar to the latest reports. i worked nights back then but due to being sore decided i would call in sick. about 10:30 pm while i had my outside dogs food soaking they started barking like something was around (coyotes, snake) so i went outside to see what was up. they were at the end of a fence line so i went to it and looked and didn't see anything they could be barking at near the ground, but i did notice a very bright light flying low to the ground way off in the distance. i thought then maybe a helicopter with a search light and if it came closer i might hear it or a plane that was flying way too low that would need to be monitored. as i recall the moon was not out thus i thought maybe that made the light seem bigger and brighter than i though even a plane would have. i quieted the dogs down and went back in to get their food. when i went back out they were back to barking at the end of the fence so i made them come get their food. i walked to the fence line again and this bright light was a lot closer to the point i should have been hearing an engine or something. i could tell it was flying low under radar since a russian plane in germany did the same thing over our army base. not hearing any sound i decided to wait and find out what could be flying that low without hearing an engine. when it came closer i could hear a humming sound (only sound it made). it passed directly overhead blocking out all the stars above and was only about 180-240 ft above the ground (mobile home 60' wide used to estimate this). it was round with some lights on a bottom that looked metallic and i estimate that it was 3-4 acre's round (size of my place now). needless to say i was amazed and scared at the same time. i ran in and got my gun and 35mm camera and notice the tv had no interference on it while the tonight show was on. when i got back outside i realized how stupid it was to get my gun since i wouldn't shoot at it. the camera was at the end of the roll so i don't think i got a picture of it (some film i still haven't ever developed). the thing was headed in a direction that would take it directly over hwy 281 and it was moving really slow, probably about 10 mph. i went back inside and wrote down all i could think about it and then called in sick to work. i considered calling the air force, but decided against it since if no harm came to me i didn't want any harm to come to it. i doubt there is any way in this world we or any earthling could have a ship that big that they could hide much less only make a humming noise to power it. 

i had heard a few years earlier that people in the north had seen something the size of football fields that the government said was objects flying in formation. this was low enough to see the huge bottom was solid and it blocked out all the stars above so it wasn't several objects flying in formation. since that time i have moved back to my place which is 3 miles out of stephenville and during that move all my belongings where outside during a 6" rain. i have never come across the information and sketch i made that night, though i haven't looked for it either. being this close to town i just considered it a once in a lifetime event that confirmed what my mother and father told me about seeing in the 50's was a lot more believable. my father was in the army 21 years and worked in radar. he told me that while firing missiles at white sands and around el paso they often tracked ufo's that sometimes had planes sent up to check it out but they never heard anything back from it. what they saw was a cigar shaped ship that was doing things none of our air craft at the time could do (he loved planes and stayed up on them). being this close to town i did not think anything like this would venture this close but last tuesday i did hear some jets fly over twice which is not a common practice for this area. since 911 i maybe only have heard them a couple of times before. also one night quite a while back i thought i heard that humming sound again, but i didn't go outside to check it out since i thought there was no way they would come this close to town. now i know different. 

i did not see what was recently seen, but selden is only about a 6 minute drive from the location of what i saw years ago. the very bright light and only making a humming sound with being big is similar enough to spark my interest. after getting on the internet and finding your site i did search some to see if any reports where made similar to what i saw. i don't think i ever filed a report with you though due to it being so long ago and i have never found the information i wrote that night. some papers where so soaked they did get thrown away, but i have never gone through everything yet. i am glad you are coming down to investigate their story and wish i could be there to talk to you too and hear what goes on. i don't care if the world believes, but i will eat your hat if you can prove what i saw was man made :), since i am 100% sure i wouldn't be eating your hat.

as for abductions i still have doubts, but wouldn't put it past any civilization to do experiments on lower life forms just as we do. probably why i got my gun during the experience, to protect my animals if need be. another strange event happened at that location another time a few years before that may have been an encounters presence but i didn't move to find out. again it was a night when i didn't go into work, but this time i was sleeping. my yorkies where barking and growling like someone was in the room near the door to which my back was facing from a small bed in my den. then they came over and jumped up on the bed and barked and growled at something close by. i had the feeling that someone was in the mobile home and standing right next to the bed so i kept my eyes closed and didn't move. when i had the feeling they had moved away i did try to move a little and i couldn't. when the dogs ran back to the door i opened my eyes and it looked like daylight outside the window. i closed my eyes again and played like i was rolling over when i heard the dogs jumping on the door and when i opened them again i realized it was pitch dark. the kitchen was right behind me so i went there first for a knife, turned a light on and then went to a bedroom for a gun. i looked out the bay windows which faced the road and didn't see any lights or hear any cars. i went outside and waited about 10 minutes and never heard a car. that time my outside dogs had not been barking. i never heard the door open and close in that time either and it was always kept locked. my yorkies had barked at the door before, but never like that or growling while barking nor did they ever do it again. it wasn't until years later that i ever thought the 2 events there might have been connected somehow. all windows and doors in the house where locked, and when i went outside my outside dogs where there to meet me. since they didn't bark i doubt the event pertained to humans. i haven't read a lot about encounters, but from what i have heard they had not happened with animals around thus i never thought of it that way until later. i can write that off maybe as a dream waking to the dogs barking and growling at the door, but i did wake up and go outside and check all the windows the next day. the ship i saw a few years later was after i had been sleeping all day and gotten up at my normal time to feed the animals before going to work. 

i don't talk a lot about these events, because if i heard them from someone else they would raise doubts with me even if they came from a trusted source. i mean i loved my mother and father and trusted them to all ends, but still it wasn't until i saw something that i could really believe what they saw may have been real. unlike their event though mime was up a lot closer than what they saw since it went directly overhead. people always want proof, but even if i had it i wouldn't give it to them now. still i'm glad to know that others have maybe seen what i saw and get a laugh how the government tries to explain it all away. i remember seeing an asteroid driving home one early morning that you could still see after daylight until it really got bright. i watched the news to see if others had seen it for days. finally after 2 weeks i did hear a report that there was a near earth miss from an asteroid, but the danger was gone. so what ever the government knows they will never reveal it because they don���t want us to panic. i seriously doubt they have made contact and with as destructive as we are i think we are only being monitored to make sure we don���t pull a stunt that may upset the universe. with america���s new strike before struck motto i just hope no one gets stupid enough to try to strike them for proof. we have fought foes mightier than us before and won, but never someone so far advanced above us. 

i hope people will enjoy their experiences if they are lucky enough to have them, picture and report about them to this type of location, but never shoot at them or report them to someone who might.
content.summary: This siting may be what i saw in 1995-moving very slow and low.

content.detailedDescription: It was over the summer and i was walking home at around 11 oclock at night, along the beach on a boardwalk. i was looking at the sky over our local pier, roughly 1/4 mile away and i noticed a strange light floating over our pier and the large hotel near it. this light was too far away to see what it was, but it was obviously much too close to be a star, and it couldnt be a plane simply because it was just floating. i watched it the whole way to the pier and when i got there i went up the stairs to these built in binoculars that can be used for 50 cents, i payed and immediately had a look at the strange ball of light. what i saw is rather difficult to explain, the binoculars not being overly powerful, but what i can describe goes like this: the craft was not any set shape, like a saucer or a sphere, it was orbish though in shape though boxy at the edges, almost squarish but with protuding objects that i couldt make out exactly. the craft was orange colored with several different colored lights on it. the objects that i mentioned before, protruded from the craft at many different angles it appeared, like beams or very large, thick antennaes. after viewing the object from the binoculars for a ittle bit, i proceeded to continue walking home, watching it the entire time. it was during this time that i noticed the objects very subtle and slow movement through the night sky, ever-so-smooth and not noticeable if you hadnt seen its original position in the sky. i saw a similar, if not the same object some weeks later, in the same part of town, which i took pictures of, though they only show the ball of light in the dark sky, however, i did also take pictures of the moon and included some sorrounding growth in the picture to have a comparison. i dont have the pictures on hand at this exact moment so i cant include them. please voice your opinion.
content.summary: Walking along the beach at night, noticed an unusual light, much too close to be a star, just floating in the sky, investigated.

content.detailedDescription:
There was a bungie jump out side a pub in in auchinairn glasgow when  i had finished school i was around 15 years old and  me and my family and many other ppl wher at the jump it was a very nice summer that year and the sky was blue no clouds or at least none that  i remember that piticular day it was still very light and as wee where out side the pub watching ppl do the bungie i looked away in another direction possible towards falkirk i saw this 
sphere like craft far in the sky it was small in size due to the distance and the movements of this was very paticular at first when i spoted it it was not moving in any direction then sudenly shoot stright up and came down on an angle and went the oposate direction similar to the number  4  then vanished it did not go out out of sight as watching a plain go out of sight it instantly vanished as for my feelings on this and what i thought this was the moment i saw it well it obvious i knew exactly what it was without a doubt it was alien i was exited and as soon as it disapered i was looking around me for other ppl who may have been looking in that direction hopeing that they seen it but did not so i was quiet about it for years until i got the internet and started reserching on it and i found out that a small town called denny  close to falkirk the direction i was looking has masses of sighting reports this confirmed what i already beleved 100% in and now i am convinced that there are to many conspirices for them all to be untrue thanks for letting me share this with you 


    john wilson from glasgow scotland
content.summary: Silverish metalic looking cphere shape

content.detailedDescription: January 12th 2008, aprox 11pm, ottawa, south keys neighborhood, bank street, near airport. these were the exact same lights as seen on december 23rd 2007, in the exact same place, over my house. lights never disperse, solid object that cannot be seen at night, but has lights on it. object flying very low at about 9 to 15 stories of an apartment building. this time i viewed the flying thing from about 2 football fields east. object moving north slowly at approx 40 miles an hour, wich is already too slow for an airplane to stay in flight, and then stops, then hovers backwards and forwards then stops (going north, stops , goes south, then north, then stops). object then hovers in place, or possibly heads west-north-west(wich means norht-west, but more west then north) wich would be directly away from us wich may be what happened. at the time we concluded that it was not a helicopter, shape of lights aswell as the absense of a helicopters noise wich would be heard from our distance, and that it was an airplane that turns over my house. but today day i've concluded, that no airplane could be going at 40 miles an hour that low, stop, and hover back and forth within 6 seconds. even if it was an airplane that was turning around in a circle, or doing a zigzag, no airplane could turn that sharp, going that slow, at that altitude, without staling. and it wouldnt be doing it at 9 stories or 100-300 feet. for an airplane to do what i saw is either extremely dangerous or impossible, most likely impossible. i did not have my glasses to see the lights in detail but the 4 others with me all saw it, and were all confused by it. one of them made a theory, wich i think is whats going on, that it is an advanced secret ufo, whatever it is, probably not extra terrestrial, flying around with airplane lights, to give the impression of an airplane. the most confusing part is that it has gone by that exact same path twice in the past 2 months. and i will be updating you on any further sightings of it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights, did not have my glasses, friends report green light(s) also.

content.detailedDescription:

content.summary: I'm always  inside looking out

content.detailedDescription: I was living at the time in ukiah california in mendocino county around 1965. my four year old son had crawled into my bed and sometime during the night there was a knocking on the window, which was directly behind the headboard of my bed. both my son and i got upon our knees and i opened the shade.  there was a being looking in at us. i could see only the head which came level with the bottom of the window.  it was the typical large head and large eyes.  but i've wondered all these years our reaction, we both imediately lay down and went to sleep.  the next day in our back yard was a round brown area in the lawn. my lawn was very small and i couldn't imagine how anything could fit, the yard was 50' x 30'. i don't even know if it was connected to the sighting.  the brown dried grass stayed for a very long time until we installed a pool on the spot.  what happened to us?  i've always wondered if that were the end of the experiance or more as over the years i've seen numerous sightings.  the last being while i lived in challis idaho.  around 2004 my 23 year old grandson, with his male friend, late at night were sitting out on the back patio.  my home at that time was in a canyon next to the salmon river.  a huge round object passed overhead, covering almost the entire sky.  he said it took around 20 minutes for it to move across the canyon and out of sight behind the mountain as it was moving so slowly.  his girl friend also saw it as she was driving home from work.  the next night i awoke and notice in the sky this object hovering over the mountain across the river.  there was also a smaller object just below the larger one.  i watched them for several minutes and fell asleep.  i awoke numerous times during the night and they was still in the same place.  when morning arrived they were gone. there are other instances of family members and myself having sightings.  my brother in law, who at the time was a mendocino county deputy sheriff, while out on patrol late one night saw a large cigar shaped object hovering over lake mendocino, a large pipe or beam came out of the bottom of the craft down into the lake.  he assumed it was taking water from the lake. he then chased it on hwy 20 and then into pottervalley where he lost it.
content.summary: My 4 yr old son and i were sleeping and a rap on the window awoke us

content.detailedDescription:
My wife stopped at the store and left the kids inside the car.  while she was inside my girls were looking up at the sky.  something caught my 7 year olds eye, she told her older sister to look up and they saw the ufo.  the ufo was not moving very fast. it stopped and stood still for a little bit, turned to a vertical position for 10 - 15 sec.  did 3 loops slowed down and almost stopped, then it picked up speed and shot off, and disappeared.  it left a vapor trail in its wake.

when it stopped and turned vertical they were able to see some detail.  it was disc shaped and the color was white.  they were also able to see a clear dome like structure on the top of it.  they thought it was a plane or rocket at first, until it stopped and turned.  as soon as my wife got back to the car the girls told her they saw a ufo.  this all happened in bremerton, washington around 230 pm saturday january 12, 2008.

they say that they were scared and amazed at the same time.  then they were excited to explain what they saw.

a little information about our location, they were approx. 20 miles away from sub base bangor washington, and 5 miles away from psns shipyard, where there is 4 aircraft carriers docked.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: My kids saw a disc shaped ufo w/  a clear dome on the top while my wife ran into the store

content.detailedDescription:
I live in southeast new mexico.

on my south-facing patio, looking into the night sky (which i've always done) i saw a two-colored flashing object. field glasses revealed a disk with red light on top, with bars separating sections, seeming to revolve counter-clockwise.  and a brilliant silver-blue base which gave a sense of movement (activity), in the same way lightning does, almost like a silver fire.  it was tilted.  after staying in the same area (due south of my house in se nm), it went south and disappeared within about 15 seconds.  

i've seen others before, the first, about 4 to 5 months ago in the south west sky and, yesterday, also due south. the ufo in the south west sky was much closer; with the naked eye, i saw bright multi-colored lights.  with field glasses, individual lights could be observed on the object.  it was half-way between round and eliptical-shaped, more vertical than horizontal.

when i noticed the first ufo, i wondered if it was a plane or satellite, but it remained stationary in the sky, peaking my curiosity.  i felt excited and, at first, a bit anxious it wouldn't be something different than a plane or satallite.

in the first instance and also this evening, i woke my sleeping husband and he joined me on the patio, observing the ufo, first with the naked eye and, next, with field glasses.

although many people have shared frightening experiences with extra-terrestrials, i feel comfort from seeing these ufo's.  i've had a bit more "up-close-and-personal" and also difficult to describe experiences that are not easy and in fact quite excruciating to attempt explaining to others.
content.summary: Ufo in se nm

content.detailedDescription: Point 9, try to ask them to appear for you (in your mind) you might be suprised.Oh and i know your telling the truth and i'm not jokeing
content.summary: Point 8, they know you are always looking for the

content.detailedDescription:
Extremely slow from a distance away in a sorta straight line glowing then fading in and out of faze.  then kept emitting a odd colorization of very bright in the sky moving accross very slowww....

only after aprox. 4 minutes it faded to an invisible look to it knowing its still there but in a instance glowed to a ultra bright light of some sort then poof gone!  just like that completely gone it was a wonderfull experience if you asked me. a pulsating light circular in nature.

the direction is east of pikes peak mountains in broad daylight.


point 1. at work patrolling the parking lots.

point 2. i have a bad habbit of always looking up always noticing weird and strange things in the sky ever since my first experience years ago never stopped looking up.

point 3. at first like anything else i always assume its a plane of some kind since its happening here in the springs area of colorado naturally there would be alot of numbered jetliners.  but thats not always the case especially this one.

point 4. moving left to right in a very odd circular object moving at veryy slow movements accross the skies for only about 4 minutes then only fading into nothingness or at least out of the range of my visual abilities.

point 5.  very good feeling not threatened in anyway just a pleaseant feeling. :)

point 6. simply disapeared right before my own eyes it gave off a 1 last ultra bright illuminating pulse and and poof gone and kept looking for the object for another 15 minutes but i never did see this strange object again but i keep a close eye in the sky whenever i can.
content.summary: Very small very very slow flashing

content.detailedDescription: Black op helicopter chasing  black cloaked object.Stayed steadily behind the object pursuing it from a distance of only a few hundred feet.Plase everyone look up and see whats actually going on!Cloudy,polluted,industrialized cities need not apply.
content.summary: Hello,they r here,wake up,look in the skies!

content.detailedDescription: My wife went outside to walk the dogs. after a few minutes she opened the door and asked me to step out and look at something. she said "what is that?" i saw lights in the sky and i said "those are just search lights from the airport." but after watching for a few minutes i realized they weren't shining on the clouds but from behind them. about ten lights (very large) doing circles and converging doing figure eights. they would shoot off leaving about five lights behind doing a lovely dance in the sky. i called my brother to tell him what we were watching and he asked me if we had a video camera. i hadn't thought of that. my wife got our camera and i shot a few minutes of video. the lights left, leaving only about three and then they too moved away. we watched the video and it came out pretty clear. our camera is older and not digital but i'm going to copy it to dvd. it was very cool and i'm looking for a good explanation.
content.summary: Lights above cloud cover doing figure eights and circles

content.detailedDescription: I went outside for a smoke and i looked up in the sky looking south and i noticed a flash in the sky, i looked more closely at the object and it was shaped like a triangle. the back of it looked like it was on fire and it streaked down towards lake superior going west really fast and then i lost sight of it because of the trees. it was going to go right into lake superior if it kept it course that i saw it was on. then about two minutes after i lost sight of it, two f18's were out circling around where i last seen the object. then three more planes showed up about five minutes after i had last seen the object. the five planes then just circled around like they were looking for something. the five planes flew around for about 20 minutes then a larger plane like a 30 passenger jet flew over the top of them going east and the five f18's followed the larger jet and left the area. i waited for about 25 minutes and kept looking over the lake, but i didn't see anything.
content.summary: I saw a flash in the sky, then a triangle shaped ship streaked accross the sky over the western part of lake superior.

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 2:30am on jan. 1st, 2008 my girlfriend and i were returning home from a friend's house in rural nd. we were traveling south on a gravel road at approx. 30 mph. my girlfriend noticed it first. she asked, "what's that bright light?" off to the east approx. 300 yards out and up 100-150 feet there was the most brilliant light i have ever seen. it did not shine in any particular direction. it just radiated and it did not appear to move. from our vantage point it was about the size of a quarter. i had no idea what it could be. we stopped the car and i got out. the light was gone. i listened and all i heard was the silence of a north dakota winter night. no nothing for 3-4 minutes and the light never reappeared. we have no idea what we saw, but what a way to start the new year.
content.summary: Brilliant light in sky

content.detailedDescription: Two of my friends and i were star watching from my buddy's truck last night, when, around 12 or 1 am, we noticed a strange blinking light in the southern sky.  it caught our eye because it didn't have the usual blink pattern of an airplane.  it was a slow blink of a yellow light and it came on and off in a steady pattern and it was like someone was playing with the dimmer switch.  it would slowly go from completely off to very bright, at a rate similar to a heartbeat.  we watched it for a few minutes trying to be sure it wasn't an airplane, then, it just disappeared (let me note it was flying towards us and it didn't turn, it didn't fly behind a cloud or anything!)  we searched the sky for a few minutes after it disappeared and couldn't find it anywhere.  it was weird.  if anybody knows anything about this, e-mail me.  garageguitarguy@aol.Com
content.summary: Slow blinking light observed before it vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking the dogs with two companions (who didn't see the event) during twilight on a warm may evening. as we walked west along the main road of a major subdivision, i watched the dogs and looked around. from the corner of my eye i saw a bright, white, shining thing up in the sky. presuming it was just the moon, i looked directly up at it, then saw it was perfectly white, and a perfect half-circle. imagine the moon when it's only half lit. it was already in motion when it caught my eye, and it was arcing upward, lightning-quick, from south up to west. and before i could open my mouth to announce it, it disappeared. i kept watch of that section of sky, trying to find it again, but it was gone. unfortunately, both my companions had been engaged in conversation and so, missed what i saw.

sizewise, to the naked eye, it appeared about the same size as the full moon, except that this was a perfect half-circle, with the left half lit brightly and the right half empty. it was featureless, no details of any kind were seen in the quick burst that i saw it. immediately, i deduced i must have just glanced very quickly at the moon and blurred it by looking away quickly. 

wrong. i found it nowhere near where i saw the white half-circle, and it was just a faint, tiny sliver of a crescent moon.

i was excited to see it; i just wish it hadn't disappeared so quickly. i would have liked to see its details.
content.summary: White, shining half-circle arcing from s to w

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were driving along mill creek rd. going northeast at about 55mph. the sky was cloudy so you couldn't see any stars. about a mile from where mill creek starts at lebanon rd, we looked up toward the southeast and saw a round star like object that glowed green. we saw it for about two seconds as it fell through the clouds. it was going way faster than any plane or helicopter i've ever seen. it flew downward at a 40 degree angle running parallel to us in the car. we only saw it for a few seconds because there were tall trees to the left of us. i would say that it was about 8 or 9 miles away from us, and a few thousand feet above us. our part of orange county is pretty populated, so i'm sure someone else had to have seen it. there's no way you could have missed a large green light flying through the clouds at night. i have no idea what it was, but i know i���ve never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: A green glowing light, flying down through a cloudy night sky at a 40 degree angle, going extremely fast.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving on i-5 north bound,just before the nisqually exit,
something caught my attention.,i observed a grey oval shaped object streek
across the freeway.It was approximatly,100-ft long,25-ft high,and there where
no beacon lights on it.It's speed was very fast,when i first noticed it,it was flying directly in the middle of(across)the freeway,about 250-ft in the air.It only took around 5-seconds before it dissapered behind a hill,to the north.I really don't know what it was.When i exited off the freeway,at the nisqually exit,i noticed an army helicopter flying in the area.,not unusual,do to fort lewis to the east.
content.summary: Oval shaped object over i-5 north bound

content.detailedDescription:
This is mr. kelly her husband reporting for her.
karina was out in our garage at the time noted smoking a cigarette. she looked out the garage door (facing east) and noticed a bright object approximately, arms extended, two hands over each from ground level. object was stationary approx 1 1/2 - 2 minutes. object then moved north at a high speed ("absolutely faster than a plane" she said) approx 5 fingers in distance and remained stationary approx 20-30 seconds. the object then moved directly verticle and an extreme speed and the brightness seemed to have simply gone. not as though it was gone from distance though, like it just blinked out.

recorded by 
t. kelly
husband
armed forces officer
content.summary: 3 times brighter than saturn. stationary then horizontal and vertical movement

content.detailedDescription:
I am going to paste the local newspaper story with url link. there was also another report in grnabury, texas in the "hood county newspaper" a day before this incident of another ufo sighting. granbury is only 30 miles away from this report.

 possible ufo sighting 



thursday, january 10, 2008 11:16 am cst





four area residents witness mysterious object, lights in selden sky

by angelia joiner staff writer 

steve allen, mike odom and lance jones were out admiring a beautiful texas sunset tuesday evening when they saw something none of them can explain.

allen called it an unidentified flying object. and, because he's been a private pilot for more than 30 years, he has a little more experience judging air speeds and distances than most.

���we all flipped out,��� allen said. ���i didn't sleep a wink last night.���

allen was at the home of mike odom in selden about 6:15 p.M. when they suddenly noticed flashing lights about ���3,500 feet above ground level,��� he said.

���the ship wasn't really visible and was totally silent, but the lights spanned about a mile long and a half mile wide,��� allen said. ���the lights went from corner to corner. it was directly above highway 67 traveling towards stephenville at a high rate of speed - about 3,000 miles per hour is what i would estimate.���

allen said the lights were not those of a normal aircraft. he said they were more like strobe lights, and while they were all watching, the lights reconfigured themselves from a single horizontal line into two sets of vertical lights.

���the two sets were approximately one-quarter of a mile apart,��� allen said. ���then they turned into dirty burning flames. the flames were not blue. they were white in color. about two seconds later it disappeared completely.���

allen said they were all scratching their heads and talking about what it could have been, when approximately 10 minutes later, the object flew overhead again.

���this time it came from the west traveling east towards glen rose,��� allen said. ���and it was about two or three miles south of 67, and two military jets, possibly f16s, were in pursuit.���

���i was asking, ���are you guys seeing that?��� allen said.

mike odom said he didn't have trouble sleeping but it was a ���wild experience.���

���it's unexplainable,��� odom said. ���it was something not natural; it was moving way too fast.���

odom said he saw one other unexplainable object in the sky in 1978 when he was in arizona.

���back then something flew over with lights all around,��� odom said. ���i think this thing bothered all of us, but it probably bothered steve more because he's a pilot and he flies a lot.���

���it was neat,��� lance jones said. ���it was something. i've never seen anything like it before but it didn't scare me. i just figured it was military.���

odom's wife, claudette, said she was previously employed as a flight attendant.

���lights were going up and down the side,��� she said. ���there was no sound, just the lights. it was moving so fast. it wasn't a plane. i know how planes move. honestly, i think it was a ufo. it was so fast you couldn't have put your finger on it and move it fast enough to follow it.���

allen said he has never seen a ufo until now, but he did suspect there was something to ufo stories all along.

���i was very surprised to finally get my eyes on one,��� allen said. ���if anybody else saw this and got pictures i hope they will contact me.���

allen said he has already reported the sighting to washington, and is in the process of writing a report on the event.

allen is the owner of l & s enterprises and texas freight in glen rose. he can be contacted at 254-898-1117.

the group plans to return to odom's house and keep an eye on the sky in the near future, hoping to see it again.

angelia joiner is a staff writer for the empire-tribune.
http://www.Empiretribune.Com/articles/2008/01/10/news/news02.Txt
content.summary: Ufo sighting in local paper

content.detailedDescription: I was outside feeding my cat when i decided to look at the stars.  i notice an object in the sky glowing in an out of sight flying a steady course south along the louisiana/texas border.  i ran in the house to get my husban because this was just to odd for me to see alone.  he came running out of the house with me to see it. we watched for about 40 seconds when all of a sudden a laser or other ship shot out from its side and flew out like a shooting star and then vanished.  the glowing object kept it's steady course and finally we could no longer see it.  we stayed for a moment wondering if the shot out thing was a laser or a ship and if its a ship then is it hovering watching us without us watching it.  don't know what it was but i am glad my hubby saw it too. it was freaky to see this long slender thing shoot out from it.  it looked kinda like a shooting star but was 20 times faster and more contained particles is the best way i can describe it.  i originially thought the craft was a plane but showed no charactoristics of any plane we have ever seen.  i would be bright and then glow would fade out and then fade back in bright and so on.
content.summary: Object glowing in and out of sight suddenly shoots laser or other ship out from its side which is then gone in a flash while glowing object keeps flying its path.

content.detailedDescription: They like you, or they wouldn't be joking around with you. keep looking for them. you never know what you might see. when i first started to see them they usually took the form of a balloon that would disappear like magic. but i've also seen cudle fish and lobsters like this one,(see attatchment) appear in the sky and then disappear. and sometimes they talk to me, how's that for insane.
content.summary: Trucher east on belvue
